text:
Hello <@U0853538G93> Wishing you Happy New Year 2025!

Please share more details and we can assist you accordingly.

Does anybody know if there is a HubL function similar to require_css() but for pre fetching/preloading assets? For example, I have some large images in a module that I would like to preload in the <head> tag of any page where the module is used, is there a hubl function that can add those to the head tag automatically? Does anybody have a suggested solution other than manually adding these for individual pages?
Would it be possible to use require_css but put a <link> tag instead of CSS?
